Properties.Description: Default API Key created by CDK

Properties.Definition:
type Planet {
  name: String
  diameter: Int
  rotationPeriod: Int
  orbitalPeriod: Int
  gravity: String
  population: [String]
  climates: [String]
  terrains: [String]
  surfaceWater: Float
  created: String
  edited: String
  id: ID!
}
type Species {
  name: String
  classification: String
  designation: String
  averageHeight: Float
  averageLifespan: Int
  eyeColors: [String]
  hairColors: [String]
  skinColors: [String]
  language: String
  homeworld: Planet
  created: String
  edited: String
  id: ID!
}

type Query {
  getPlanets: [Planet]
}
